net.sourceforge.taglets.j2se15.driver
Class JavaDocLogger

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.taglets.j2se15.driver.JavaDocLogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
Logger
public class JavaDocLogger
extends Object
implements Logger

JavaDoc 1.5 specific Logger.

Note:

This implementation relies on internal state of the JavaDoc 1.5 implementation and is bound to break if the internal implementation changes. There is currently no way to reliably use the messaging methods of the JavaDoc API, sic!

Version:
1.7 (2008/03/30 12:43:23)
Maintainer:
Bruno Essmann <essmann@sourceforge.net>
Since:
1.4.0

JavaDocLogger

public JavaDocLogger(Logger logger,
                     SimpleTaglet taglet,
                     com.sun.tools.doclets.internal.toolkit.taglets.TagletWriter writer,
                     com.sun.javadoc.SourcePosition position)
Creates a new J2SE 1.5 JavaDoc specific Logger.

Parameters:
logger - the fallback logger to use.
taglet - the taglet to create the messenger for.
writer - the writer to use in the context of the messenger.
position - the source position to use, null if not available.
Since:
1.4.0
Method Detail

configure

protected boolean configure(com.sun.tools.doclets.internal.toolkit.taglets.TagletWriter writer)
Configures the message retriever of the specified taglet writer to use our special resource bundle.

Parameters:
writer - the writer whose message retriever should be configured.
Returns:
true if the configuration was successful, false otherwise.
Since:
1.4.0

getMessageRetriever

protected Object getMessageRetriever(com.sun.tools.doclets.internal.toolkit.taglets.TagletWriter writer)
                              throws SecurityException,
                                     NoSuchMethodException,
                                     IllegalArgumentException,
                                     IllegalAccessException,
                                     InvocationTargetException
Returns the message retriever attached to the specified taglet writer.

Note:

This exposes internal state and is therefore bound to break in future incarnations of the JavaDoc implementation.

Parameters:
writer - the taglet writer for which to get the message retriever.
Returns:
the message retriever if available, null otherwise.
Throws:
NoSuchMethodException - passed on.
SecurityException - passed on.
InvocationTargetException - passed on.
IllegalAccessException - passed on.
IllegalArgumentException - passed on.
Since:
1.4.0

invokePrintMethod

protected void invokePrintMethod(Object messageRetriever,
                                 String method,
                                 Object[] args)
                          throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                 SecurityException,
                                 IllegalAccessException,
                                 InvocationTargetException,
                                 NoSuchMethodException
Invokes the specified print method on the given message retriever.

Parameters:
messageRetriever - the message retriever for which to invoke a printing method.
method - name of the print method to invoke, supported methods include "notice", "warning", "error".
args - the arguments to pass to the print method, must conform to the MESSAGE_RETRIEVER_PRINT_SIGNATURE.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - passed on.
SecurityException - passed on.
IllegalAccessException - passed on.
InvocationTargetException - passed on.
NoSuchMethodException - passed on.
Since:
1.4.0

configureResourceBundle

protected void configureResourceBundle(Object messageRetriever)
                                throws SecurityException,
                                       NoSuchFieldException,
                                       IllegalArgumentException,
                                       IllegalAccessException
Replaces the resource bundle of the message retriever by a tweaked version that includes our new resource keys.

Parameters:
messageRetriever - the message retriever to configure.
Throws:
NoSuchFieldException - passed on.
SecurityException - passed on.
IllegalAccessException - passed on.
IllegalArgumentException - passed on.
Since:
1.4.0

printMessage

protected boolean printMessage(String type,
                               String message)
Prints the message with the given type using the message retriever attached to the TagletWriter of this messenger.

Parameters:
type - the type of message to print, supported types include "Notice", "Warning", "Error".
message - the message to print.
Returns:
true if the message was issued, false if there was an error delivering the message.
Since:
1.4.0

debug

public void debug(String message)
Description copied from interface: Logger
Logs the specified debugging message.

Note:

Debugging messages are only printed if the debug option is activated at the taglets configuration.

Specified by:
debug in interface Logger
Parameters:
message - the debugging message to log.
Since:
1.4.0

info

public void info(String message)
Description copied from interface: Logger
Logs the specified information message.

Note:

Informational messages are only printed if verbose message output is activated at the taglets configuration.

Specified by:
info in interface Logger
Parameters:
message - the message to emit.
Since:
1.4.0

warning

public void warning(String message)
Description copied from interface: Logger
Logs the specified warning message.

Note:

Warning messages printed using the simple logger are completely separate from the JavaDoc doclet logging facility.

Specified by:

Parameters:
message - the message to emit.
